message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SI 

This paper discusses the use of blockchain-based cryptocurrencies in IoT applications, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). The paper also proposes a payment channel network design, which involves routing and balancing of payments, making it relevant to distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses the use of multi-point connections for IoT devices, which can be considered a form of network optimization and performance analysis (cs.SI).
